Sentencas: Biomass reformation is an interesting path for hydrogen production and its use for efficient energy generation.
Titulo: Analysis of a SOFC energy generation system fuelled with biomass reformate

Sentencas: The main target is the fully exploitation of the potential of renewable fuels.
Titulo: Analysis of a SOFC energy generation system fuelled with biomass reformate

Sentencas: To this aim, the coupling a biomass reformer together with a high temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack shows some advantages for the similar operating temperature of the two processes and the internal reforming capability of the SOFC.
Titulo: Analysis of a SOFC energy generation system fuelled with biomass reformate

Sentencas: The latter further allows less stringent composition requirements of the feed gas from a gasifier and internal cooling of the SOFC.
Titulo: Analysis of a SOFC energy generation system fuelled with biomass reformate

Sentencas: In this work, a complete model of a SOFC coupled with a biomass gasifier is used to identify the main effects of the operating conditions on the fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Analysis of a SOFC energy generation system fuelled with biomass reformate

Sentencas: The gasification process has been simulated by an equilibrium model able to compute the reformate composition under different operating conditions, whereas a 3D fluid dynamics simulation (FLUENT) coupled with an external model for the electrochemical reactions has been used to predict the fuel cell performance in terms of electrical response and mass-energy fluxes.
Titulo: Analysis of a SOFC energy generation system fuelled with biomass reformate

Sentencas: A 14 kW integrated SOFC-gasifier system has been analysed with this model to address the response of a planar SOFC as a function of the gasifier operating conditions.
Titulo: Analysis of a SOFC energy generation system fuelled with biomass reformate
